content:
a writ that states the reason of their incarceration / crime and promises a trial for their case that is required to be provided before they are arrested and put in jail
	trials: rights of englishmen
	can be limited: in times of invasion or rebellion

lincoln actually suspends habeas corpus in the civil war because he feared that “southern-sympathizers” would be assassins
	he rounded some of them up and threw them in jail for no reason (as a preemptive measure)
	supreme court later ruled this move unconstitutional (after he died)
	this case is called ex parte merryman
